original_title: Annual govt-approved payments settled within the year for first time in 25 years
original_body_lines: The Treasury has released funds for all government-approved payments until 15 December 2023, aligning with the 2023 Budget.
The President’s Media Division (PMD) highlighted that this marks the first instance in 25 years where all payments have been settled within a single year.
Additionally, the Treasury has ensured the timely disbursement of funds, including arrears, for the retirement gratuities of officers retiring up to 19 December 2023.
